overview:
Background Akash Agarwal is a 18-year business management executive in high technology with experience spanning general management, marketing, product development, strategic alliances, and sales. His experience includes starting two consumer internet company’s, raising venture capital and a tenure at Oracle Corp.

Experience 07- Founder/CEO GreenNote, Inc. 04-07 Alliances/Sales - Mercury (MERQ) acq by HP 01-03 Business Development/Alliances - SeeBeyond (SBYN) acq by SUN 99-01 Founder, CEO iTheo.com Inc.(e-comm) acq by Artisan Networks, Inc 98-99 Marketing/BD - ValiCert (IPO) now part of Tumbleweed 90-96 Prod Marketing/Mgmt - Oracle Corp

Education MBA, Harvard Business School, General Management (1998) Bsc. Hons. Comp Science, University of Kent at Canterbury, UK (1990)
